template:
Create an image of [subject] using a flat and minimalistic theme.  

The image must have minimal characters and no text anywhere. 

Keep the illustration to the point with respect to [subject] 

The image must use the following colors:  

rgb(28,165,79) - Forest Green. 
rgb(255,228,93) - Dandelion Yellow. 
rgb(255,255,255) - Pure White. 
rgb(224,224,224) - Light Gray. 
rgb(0, 102, 179) - Blue. 

The background of the image must be white
